content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARMCD
      operator: empty
    - name: ARM
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000119
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when ARM is not empty, but ARMCD is empty
Outcome:
  Message: ARM is populated, when ARMCD is NULL
  Output Variables:
    - ARMCD
    - ARM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0521
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: If ARMCD is null, then ARM must be null and ARMNRS
                  must be populated with the reason ARMCD is null.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 4
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when ARM is not empty, but ARMCD is empty

Outcome.Message: ARM is populated, when ARMCD is NULL

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If ARMCD is null, then ARM must be null and ARMNRS must be populated with the reason ARMCD is null.
